original_title: Kottawa Raid Uncovers 458 Bullets and Heroin
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A major breakthrough in narcotics and illegal arms investigations was made in the Rukmale Road area of Kottawa, where police apprehended a 24-year-old suspect in possession of a large cache of illicit items, including heroin and various types of live ammunition.According to police sources, the suspect was found with 75 grams and 400 milligrams of heroin, along with a stockpile of 458 live ammunition rounds, including T-56 bullets.Authorities also recovered 30 counterfeit vehicle license plates, 15 forged revenue licenses, 15 fake insurance certificates, and two mobile phones believed to be used in criminal activities.The suspect, a resident of Angulana, Moratuwa, was taken into custody and has been handed over to the Western Province - South Crimes Investigation Unit for further interrogation and legal proceedings.
